data.eml:eml: Nectria-related fungi causing dieback and canker diseases in China, with Neothyronectriacitri sp. nov. described

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Qin, Chen, Wen-Yan, Jiang, Ning, Tian, Cheng-Ming (2019): Nectria-related fungi causing dieback and canker diseases in China, with Neothyronectriacitri sp. nov. described. MycoKeys 56: 49-66, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.56.36079, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.56.36079
